Intermediate Projects

Scientific Calculator

Implement a menu system to select operations of two values. if the user types ‘quit’, then end the process.

  • addition

  • subtraction

  • multiplication

  • division

  • exponential

  • logarithms

  • cos - either by eulers formula or taylor series

  • sin - either by eulers formula or taylor series
